document_data.name: Chrysoprase
document_data.mainbody: '''Chrysoprase''' was a [[Semi-precious stones|semi-precious stone]] found all across the ''Realms''. The largest deposits were located in the [[Storm Horns|Storm Horn Mountains]] of [[Cormyr]] were it was known as '''stormrock'''.
document_data.Description: Chrysophrase was a translucent form of [[chalcedony]] that had a color reminiscent of green [[apple]]s. It was a popular gemstone in Cormyr where it often found use in women's earrings and brooches worn on the chest.
document_data.Powers:
Chrysoprase was used in the creation of items and spells that dealt with conferring or piercing ''[[invisibility]]'' effects. It could be ground to a powder and used in magical [[ink]] for inscribing scrolls with invisibility or anti-invisibility spells. It could be used as a spell component in those same spells, and it was often used to adorn ''[[ring of invisibility|rings of invisibility]]''.

Chrysoprase was one of the "nine secrets"—stones that could be enchanted to become ''[[ioun stones]]''.
document_data.Price: A typical stone had a base value of 50 gold pieces.
